name: No Escape?!
description:
Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to help our hero escape the UFO.

Features & Gameplay:

➢ a classical 2D action-packed infinite runner game,

➢ character customization,

➢ collect gold coins,

➢ explore surreal environments.

☆☆☆☆☆☆☆

High ratings and positive feedbacks will ensure further development of the game.

Have fun playing!
